mapper.select: SELECT region.id AS "id", region.parent_area_code AS "parent_id", region.area_name AS "title", region.area_code AS "value", region.area_code AS "key", region.deep as "deep", (SELECT CASE WHEN count(1) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM t_area_city_source WHERE parent_area_code = region.area_code ) AS "has_children" FROM t_area_city_source region where 1=1 and region.parent_area_code = #{parentCode}
